ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.
M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: I have thoughts or images about all my shortcomings, failings, faults, mistakes.
Notes: 1= Not At All True; 3= Somewhat True; 5= Very True

ElementDescription: I have thoughts or images about events that come into my head even when I do not wish to think about them again.
Notes: 1= Not At All True; 3= Somewhat True; 5= Very True

ElementDescription: I have thoughts or images that I won't be able to do my job/work because I feel so badly.
Notes: 1= Not At All True; 3= Somewhat True; 5= Very True

ElementDescription: I have thoughts or images that are difficult to forget.
Notes: 1= Not At All True; 3= Somewhat True; 5= Very True

ElementDescription: Once I start thinking about the situation, I can't stop.
Notes: 1= Not At All True; 3= Somewhat True; 5= Very True

ElementDescription: I notice that I think about the situation.
Notes: 1= Not At All True; 3= Somewhat True; 5= Very True

ElementDescription: I have thoughts or images of the situation that I try to resist thinking about.
Notes: 1= Not At All True; 3= Somewhat True; 5= Very True

ElementDescription: I think about the situation all the time.
Notes: 1= Not At All True; 3= Somewhat True; 5= Very True

ElementDescription: I know I shouldn't think about the situation, but can't help it.
Notes: 1= Not At All True; 3= Somewhat True; 5= Very True

ElementDescription: I have thoughts or images about the situation and wish it would go better.
Notes: 1= Not At All True; 3= Somewhat True; 5= Very True
sum of (rnt1, rnt2, rnt3, rnt4, rnt5, rnt6, rnt7, rnt8, rnt9, rnt10)
